member.name: CRYPT_PSOURCE_ALGORITHM
member.summary: The CRYPT_PSOURCE_ALGORITHM structure identifies the algorithm and (optionally) the value of the label for an RSAES-OAEP key encryption.

summary.para: The address of a null-terminated ANSI string that contains the object identifier (OID) of the algorithm. This can be the following value or any other mask generation function OID.

member.name: CRYPT_PSOURCE_ALGORITHM.EncodingParameters
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB that contains the label. This member is optional and may contain an empty BLOB.
